characterList.description: Three robots, visually distinct by their predominantly blue color scheme. One robot is yellow with a blue 'CAT' logo.
characterList.name: Blue Alliance Robots

characterList.description: Three robots, visually distinct by their predominantly red color scheme. One robot has green accents.
characterList.name: Red Alliance Robots

characterList.description: A large crowd in the stands of a gymnasium, dressed in various team colors and cheering.
characterList.name: Audience

characterList.description: Two referees in black and white striped shirts standing on the field.
characterList.name: Referees

content_metadata.description: This video showcases a tiebreaker match between Red and Blue alliances in the FIRST Robotics Competition, featuring intense robot gameplay, strategic maneuvers, and a celebratory conclusion.

qAndA.question: How many Power Cells are visible on the field at the start of the match?

qAndA.answer: The green accented red robot scores the first Power Cell into the high goal.
qAndA.question: Which robot scores the first Power Cell into the high goal?

qAndA.answer: All six robots attempt to climb.
qAndA.question: How many robots attempt to climb at the end of the match?

qAndA.answer: The final score is 89 to 67 in favor of the red alliance.
qAndA.question: What is the final score of the match?

qAndA.answer: The mood is celebratory, especially for the red alliance who won, and relieved for all teams as the tense competition concludes.
qAndA.question: What is the mood of the scene at the end of the match?

activities.description: Robots are positioned behind the starting line. The announcer counts down the start of the match.

characterInteraction.description: No direct interaction, but the robots are positioned as opposing teams.

scenes.contextualRelevance: The introduction sets the stage for the competitive match.

mood.description: Excited. The announcer's voice, the cheering crowd, and the fast-paced camera movement create a sense of anticipation and excitement.

narrativeProgression.description: The scene sets the stage for the tiebreaker match, introducing the robots and the competitive environment.

scenes.title: Match Introduction and Start

videoEditingDetails.description: The camera pans across the game field, showing the robots and the audience. A countdown timer appears on the screen. The camera zooms in on the game field as the match begins.

activities.description: Robots move around the field, shooting Power Cells into goals, collecting Power Cells, and strategizing with their alliance partners.

characterInteraction.description: Robots interact through gameplay, competing for Power Cells and attempting to outmaneuver each other.

scenes.contextualRelevance: This period is critical for teams to gain points and showcase strategic play.

mood.description: Intense, competitive. Fast-paced action, sound effects, and the constantly updating scoreboard create a sense of urgency and competition. At 1:30 the announcer highlights that the match is very close and could go either way, heightening the tension.

narrativeProgression.description: This scene is the core of the match, showcasing the robots' capabilities and the strategic gameplay.

scenes.title: Teleoperated Period

videoEditingDetails.description: The camera follows the action on the field, focusing on scoring attempts and key strategic movements. The scoreboard is regularly displayed, showing the current score and remaining time. Sound effects emphasize the impact of robots colliding and Power Cells being scored.

activities.description: Robots attempt to climb onto the 'generator switch' structure for endgame points.

characterInteraction.description: Robots compete for limited space on the climbing structure.

scenes.contextualRelevance: The endgame shifts the focus to climbing, showcasing a different skill set and strategy.

mood.description: Exciting, suspenseful. The audience cheers as the robots race against time to climb the structure.

narrativeProgression.description: This scene brings the match to a close, determining the final score based on successful climbs.

scenes.title: Endgame

videoEditingDetails.description: The camera focuses on the robots as they maneuver to climb the structure. Slow-motion replays emphasize the successful climbs. The scoreboard updates to reflect the endgame points.

activities.description: Robots are disabled. Teams celebrate or console each other. Referees confer and announce the official score.

characterInteraction.description: Teams interact, shaking hands and congratulating each other.

scenes.contextualRelevance: The conclusion highlights sportsmanship and learning experience.

mood.description: Relieved, celebratory. The tense atmosphere dissipates as the match ends.

keyMoments.changeDescription: The announcer declares the red alliance as the winner, shifting the mood to celebratory for the red team and slightly subdued for the blue.

narrativeProgression.description: This scene provides closure to the match, emphasizing the sportsmanship and the spirit of FIRST Robotics.

scenes.thematicElements: Sportsmanship, gracious professionalism, learning from experience
scenes.title: Post-Match

videoEditingDetails.description: The camera pans across the field, capturing the reactions of the teams and the audience. The final score is displayed prominently.

activities.description: The final score and match details are presented in a graphically stylized format.

scenes.contextualRelevance: A summary scene reinforcing the results and team achievements.

mood.description: Informative, celebratory. The visuals emphasize the final score and the winning alliance.

narrativeProgression.description: This scene summarizes the match outcome and acknowledges the participating teams.

scenes.title: Results Screen

videoEditingDetails.description: Animated transitions and graphics highlight the scores and team logos. Background music plays while the results are displayed.

climax.description: The final moments of the endgame, as robots frantically try to climb and secure their positions before time runs out.

storylines.description: The video details the intense tiebreaker match between the Red and Blue alliances, featuring strategic gameplay, technical skills, and a sportsmanlike conclusion.

content_metadata.title: FIRST Robotics Competition - Quarterfinal 4 Tiebreaker Match

trimmingSuggestions.description: Scene 4 (Post-Match): This scene could be trimmed by removing some of the footage of teams clearing the field, as it is less dynamically engaging compared to the match action.

text_to_speech: summers behind the line in three two one go and we're off for quarterfinal four match three shots going up on both sides from 829 1747 Harrison a few last shots from the kilobytes teleoperated period more shots going up from team Roboto from the bottom of their trench as they move to the center of the field Huskies on hogs picking up Power Cells chasing some down as a 29 comes roaring through their trench looking to collect from their Alliance station volleys going up on the red Alliance side scoring in both the top and bottom goals but the few more for good measure blue Alliance in the lead 53 to 45 46 with 85 seconds left to go in the match mug shot from the digital goats their shooters like a laser she provided loving up some shots there beretta Lions closing the gap it's now 59 to 52 this could be anybody's match both of these teams are hungry for a win Harrison boiler robotics after a new load of balls goats getting a little short there but looking to hole you hang on to that shallow lead 39 seconds left in the match teams getting ready to line up but kilobytes racing through the center to get a few more shots in along with Harrison brother Apothic putting in a few more for good measure we're in the last 30 seconds of the match past 20 seconds of the match blue Alliance red Alliance has the lead 74 67 15 seconds to go three blue robots gone [Applause] [Music] you could cut the tension in this room with the lightsaber the winner of this match goes on to semis the loser goes home but everybody wins here because we are building the future together let's take a look at the final scores for quarterfinal throw our tiebreaker match [Applause] [Music] [Applause] with the score of 79 to 32 thank you so much Alliance number six captained by 1747 with their partners four four seven and eight twenty nine but a valiant fight you put up this weekend you should be proud of the work you've done most

youtube_description:
Footage of the 2020 Bloomington District is courtesy of FIRST Indiana Robotics.

Follow us on Twitter (@FIRSTINRobotics) and Facebook (FIRST Indiana Robotics).

For more information and future event schedules, visit our website: www.firstindianarobotics.org

Thanks for watching!
youtube_title: FIRST Indiana Robotics - 2020 Bloomington District Event - Quarterfinal 4 Tiebreaker
